Title: Emerald
Description:
Emerald is an ASP.NET forum web application.

The project goal is to provide a fully operational forum with decent functionality using the latest Microsoft technologies.

It is developed in C#/ASP.NET 3.5 and using the latest AJAX controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Emerald is an ASP.NET forum web application.

The project goal is to provide a fully operational forum with decent functionality using the latest Microsoft technologies.

It is developed in C#/ASP.NET 3.5 and using the latest AJAX controls.

Note
This project is a relaunch of a previous alpha project (http://www.codeplex.com/myforum) abandoned due to a lack of time. MyForum will be deleted as soon as the first release of Emerlad will be on the rails.
